description: The idea of the project came during the preparation for immigration to Canada. I decided to do something that could potentially help me learn the language and improve my React skills at the same time. Inspired by the Quizlet web app. Status: V1.0 deployed.
Implementation of UI design as a cross platform Mobile Web Application. Status: Work in progress.

Creating cross-platform applications for the restaurant and retail sectors, including projects like Kitchen Video Screens and Point of Sale systems for a client who is a member of the Fortune 500 Enterprise. I can't provide detailed information due to a signed NDA but do not hesitate to review my personal site portfolio for more available details.
